# HUD::SET_RADAR_ZOOM_TO_BLIP

## Summary
Zooms in/out enough so that the passed blip is on the edge of the minimap

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **FLOAT** offset = 0

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Must be called every frame - keeps it locked to a blip
